浀字的基本解释

浀
qū
〔浀池〕同“曲池”，中国春秋时鲁国地名。

浀字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qū］
古地名用字。也作“曲”。一说为水名，误。

浀字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　浀； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页623第03
【正字通】與曲通。浀池，水名。【左傳·桓十二年】盟于曲池。【穀梁傳】作浀池。【公羊傳】作歐蛇。

浀字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
浀字的起名意思

暂无。

Jade
Basic explanation of words
Jade
qū
〔浀池〕Same as "Quchi", the place name of Lu in the Spring and Autumn Period of China.
Jade
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［qū］
Ancient place names use words. Also compose "Music". It is wrong to say that it is the name of water.
Jade
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Siji 1] [Shui Character Department] 　浀; Kangxi Strokes: 10; Page Number: Page 623 No. 03
【Zhengzitong】and Qutong. Yunchi, the name of the water. [Zuo Zhuan·Huan Twelve Years] Allied in Quchi. [Gu Liang Chuan] as a pond. 【The Story of the Gongyang】As a snake in Europe.
